description:
* Chosen by Apple for App Store Essentials *

AutoStitch is the highest-quality panorama app available on the App Store, generating beautiful wide-angle panoramas of up to 18 megapixels, with no visible seams.

AutoStitch is the only panorama app that can stitch photos in any order or arrangement, including vertical, horizontal, or mixed arrangements.  It achieves superb image quality by stitching full-resolution camera images rather than low-resolution video frames as used in other apps.

Our new StitchGuide* mode makes it easy to capture exactly the scene that you want.  The augmented reality interface elegantly displays the positions where previous images have been taken, making it easy to line up your next photo perfectly.

(*StitchGuide requires an iPhone4/iPad2/iPod5 or newer, and iOS 5.0 or greater)

Features:
● Simple and intuitive interface. Just snap overlapping images and tap "Stitch"
● Highest quality and resolution available on the app store (up to 18 megapixels!)
● Stitch any number from 2 to 40 or more images, in any arrangement
● Stitch photos that were taken with any camera app
● Crop the result with automatic or manual cropping
● Share your creations via email, Facebook, or Twitter

What the reviewers have been saying:

- “The new AutoStitch is -- amazingly -- even better than the old one” -- Cult of Mac

- "AutoStitch raises the bar on iPhone panoramas... an excellent program that lets you take the pictures while it does the work." -- TUAW

- "Having a camera on the iPhone allows for some cool applications and AutoStitch is definitely one of the coolest." -- Appolicious
releaseNotes:
New AutoStitch icon!

Bug fixes and improvements.
